net.jbasics.misc

Class DeltaTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jbasics.misc.DeltaTimer

  • public final class DeltaTimer
extends Object

    Determine Elapsed Time Between Events (for debugging)

    This object allows for easier way to keep track of elapsed time between code statements.

    In order for output to be displayed, the logging level of TRACE must be enabled.

    Usage: 

        private static final Logger log = LogManager.getLogger();
    ... any code here ...
    final DeltaTimer deltaTimer = new DeltaTimer();  // instantiates and starts the timer
    ... more code ...
    deltaTimer.start();  // restarts the timer
    ... yet more code ...
    log.trace("Elapsed microseconds = " + deltaTimer.elapsedMicros());
    ... you guessed it ...
    log.info(deltaTimer.toString());
    ... etc ...
    Version:
    2019-12-18
    Author:
    Rob Stoecklein

      DeltaTimer()
      For convenience, the default constructor automatically starts the timer.
